title: Free Life ~Record of the Struggle of a Different World General Merchant~ - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Shounen   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Carefree Protagonist   Cheats   Dungeons   European Ambience   Game Elements   Gangs   Hidden Abilities   Hiding True Abilities   Lazy Protagonist   Level System   Maids   Male Protagonist   Masochistic Characters   Misunderstandings   Monsters   Orphans   Overpowered Protagonist   Polygamy   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Transported into a Game World   Transported to Another World   Underestimated Protagonist
author: Kigatsukeba Kedama   気がつけば毛玉
description:
The parallel world known as “Earth” split in two; one world was full of magic, the other possessed none. Into the first, a single man fell. “He should have been playing a game, but…” Fortunately, he retained the status of the character that he created in VRMMORPG “Another World Online”, so he did not merely just die.

Three years later.

He, Takahiro Sayama, opened a ‘General Store’ in the eastern Royal Capital… he himself wants to give up, but… As for the story itself, this is a romantic comedy between him, and the girls that surround him.>
